title: "NEXUS: NExt generation of EXposomics in the United States"

![](images/nexusround.jpg){fig-alt="" fig-align="center" style="float: right;" width="266"}

The NEXUS is a Center for Exposome Research Coordination, aiming to serve the broad biomedical research community by orchestrating the advancement and promotion of exposome research.

The center is supported by the National Institutes of Health under grant number **U24ES036819**.
